open.title: Vumatel Reach Outage | Citicon
open.description: Vumatel Reach has informed us of a network outage affecting Citicon, affected clients will experience limited to no connectivity. Vumatel Reach engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.

open.title: Frogfoot Outage | Western Cape
open.description: We are investigating reports of no connectivity affecting clients on the Frogfoot network in the Western Cape. We are working on identifying and resolving this issue as quickly as possible. We apologize for any inconvenience that this may be causing.

updates.content: Connectivity has been restored. We are monitoring for stability.

open.title: Vumatel installation and maintenance problems | Khayelitsha & Delft
open.description: We would like to inform you about the challenges that we are currently experiencing with installation & maintenance activities in the Khayelitsha and Delft areas, Western Cape. Due to increased violence in this area, our contractor partners are not able to freely access the area to work. All maintenance and installation activities in this area will be on hold until further notice. The safety of our contractor partners remains our priority.
